Title: The B. Team
Plot: Michael is presented with a new business opportunity that could change his life, but unfortunately, he needs his family to sign off.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language, sexual references and drug references
GuestStars: Carl Weathers, Scott Baio, Henry Winkler, John Krasinski, Ron Howard, Andy Richter, Conan O'Brien, Judy Greer, Brian Glazer, Isla Fisher
